en:
Were ya out cold again, @CharacterName?
You have a habit of bein' late, whatever the
occassion!

If ya wanna be as dependable as you said
ya wanted to be...

oversleepin' on the day the crystals were
stolen was a bad start!

Tell ya what, son.
I got some mighty fine upgrades that'll make
up for what y'are missin'.

There's even one that makes up for when ya
fall asleep out on the field.
Now that's one I highly recommend to ya!
